==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|りょう|しゅう|yomi=on}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りょうしゅう}}

# [[receipt]], usually of money

====Compounds====
* [[領収書]] (''ryōshūsho''): formal receipt
* [[領収証]] (''ryōshūshō''): receipt
* [[領収書の控え]] (''ryōshūsho no hikae''): counterfoil of a receipt

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=trans|りょうしゅう}}

# [[receive]] money etc.
#: {{ja-usex|入場料金を領収する|にゅうじょう りょうきん を りょうしゅう する|receive the entrance fee}}
